name: quatrix-root
description: Quatrix - Advanced Game Server Management Panel for CS2

scripts.dev: npx concurrently --names "SERVER,CLIENT" --prefix-colors "cyan.bold,magenta.bold" --prefix "[{name}]" "npm run dev --prefix server" "npx wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf server/dist && rimraf client/dist
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.fix: npx rimraf node_modules server/node_modules client/node_modules && npm run install-all

author: cspamsky
